item.title: Delta tea
item.dc:creator: @fareed fareed
item.description:
@fareed wrote:

Delta Tea!
if u like it rep for me
You Click on Tea drink it, and give u an empty cup after. Easy coding just something fun Hehe.

Add This in Potions.java above Case 391 or 386

case 1978: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); if(c.eatemote==0){c.setAnimation(0x33D);} //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You Drink Some Tea."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It Refreshes You."); } if(c.currentHealth <= 0) { break; } c.deleteItem(1978, slot, 1); c.addItem(1980, 1); c.currentHealth += 4; if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;
